pages.title: It's Only Natural
pages.text: Another important tool of natural magicks is the $(item)Natural Altar$(). Unlike the $(thing)Ritual of the Forest$(), it directly utilises the local $(thing)Aura$() to imbue objects with potent natural energies. For now, lets use it to transform a $(item)Redstone Root$() into $(item)Wildroot$()
Creating the $(item)Natural Altar$() using the $(l:quests/chap4/02forestritual)Ritual of the Forest$().

pages.name: Natural Altar
pages.text: How to assemble the $(item)Natural Altar$(). Note the block under the altar is empty, so can be used for automation.
